title: Can't install stickers via automation framework
body:
# Problem

Stickers tests are failing

## Logs

```
o.appium.uiautomator2.common.exceptions.InvalidCoordinatesException: Coordinate [x=1000.0, y=1700.0] is outside of element rect: [0,0][768,1184]
```

https://ethstatus.testrail.net/index.php?/tests/view/718113
https://ethstatus.testrail.net/index.php?/tests/view/718114
Already have e2e for stickers on mainnet
